Interface OrderRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<OrderEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OrderEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<OrderEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<OrderEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<OrderEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<OrderEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<OrderEntity,Long>
@Repository public interface OrderRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<OrderEntity,Long>
The OrderRepository interface provides data access methods for OrderEntity using Spring Data JPA.

This repository supports CRUD operations and includes custom queries for retrieving orders based on deletion status, user association, and order status.

It is designed to work with logically deleted records (via isDeleted = false) to ensure soft-deletion behavior across the application.

Used by the service layer for retrieving orders in various contexts, such as by user, status, or ID.

  • Method Details

    • findAllByIsDeletedFalse

      List<OrderEntity> findAllByIsDeletedFalse()
      Retrieves all non-deleted orders.
      Returns:
      A list of orders where isDeleted = false.

    • findByIdAndIsDeletedFalse

      List<OrderEntity> findByIdAndIsDeletedFalse(Long id)
      Retrieves a specific non-deleted order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order.
      Returns:
      A list containing the order if found and not deleted.

    • findByUserIdAndIsDeletedFalse

      List<OrderEntity> findByUserIdAndIsDeletedFalse(Long id)
      Retrieves all non-deleted orders associated with a specific user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of orders belonging to the specified user.

    • findByStatus

      List<OrderEntity> findByStatus(OrderStatusEnum status)
      Retrieves all orders with the specified status, regardless of deletion.
      Parameters:
      status - The OrderStatusEnum to filter by.
      Returns:
      A list of orders with the given status.
